definition[0]: a feeling of great sadness, usually because someone has died or because something terrible has happened to you
example[1]: He expressed his sorrow at my father’s death.
example[2]: Claudia felt a deep pang of sorrow for the woman.
explanation[0]: In everyday English, people usually say sadness rather than sorrow:
example[3]: She talked about her sadness after his death.
definition[1]: an event or situation that makes you feel great sadness
example[6]: Her friend was sorrowing over the loss of a child.
